title: Fantsy music pack_EVERLASTING
description: This pack is perfect for fantasy RPG games with a unified worldview. Magnificent and beautiful melodies and powerful orchestral sounds will take the game to even greater heights.
longDescription:
All Tracks Are YouTube Safe!


You can listen to the full song digest.

https://youtu.be/lRnvHAzwXFo

Apple Music/Spotify/Amazon Music/You Tube Music/AWA/LINE MUSIC


This pack has the feel of the most popular fantasy RPG game songs originating from Japan. However, it can be used for many different genres of games, not just RPGs and SLGs. Rather than being a narrow pack that only focuses on one game context (like combat or dungeon music), this pack has a little bit of everything. This makes this pack a great starting point for your game music and eliminates the need to buy various packs to start your project.


Please choose the method that is most convenient for you.


This pack contains the full-length song and a WAV file with the intro and loop sections separated.

If you play the loop section after the intro section has finished playing, you can get endless background music without any noise.


Do you want to loop songs using "MetaSound"? This pack contains image data with the values ​​of "Loop Start" and "Loop Duration" necessary for looping.



Don't just listen to boring songs that just repeat.Enjoy a magnificent sound with rich intonation and development.


〜Recorded music〜

1."EVERLASTING" Main Thema

2.Time to go

3.Encounter the enemy

4.To make a long journey

5.Cryptic Caves

6.Gorgeous port town

7.Hyperbolic ime chamber

8.Gates of hell

9.Peaceful village

10.Leprechaun forest

11.Bustling castle town

12.Wriggling underground passage

13.Paramount war

14.Ending credits of "EVERLASTING"
technicalDetails:
Number of audio WAVs: 52

Number of audio cues: 52

Sample rate/bitrate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does the music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 50 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: ALL

Supported Target Build Platforms: ALL

Important/Note: All sounds are created by me. Takenobu Yamana(Music Creator Yamana)
